Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a game-ending RBI double in the ninth inning to lift the Astros to a 3-2 win
Others: Framber Valdez pitched seven no-hit innings
Jake Meyers singled off James McArthur with one out in the ninth
Bryan Abreu took over to start the eighth and retired Michael Massey on a fly ball before pinch-hitter MJ Melendez grounded out
Pinch-hitter Kyle Isbel then grounded a single to left field for the Royals' first hit
Seth Lugo permitted six hits and a run with nine strikeouts in six innings
